Module com.example.project
Package javafxUI

Class Account

java.lang.Object
javafxUI.Account
Direct Known Subclasses:
Checking, Savings
public abstract class Account extends Object
Account Class is an abstract class that defines the common data and operations for all account type; each account has a profile that uniquely identifies the account holder. This is the superclass of all account types, and it is an abstract class with 3 abstract methods.
Author:
Sumanth Rajkumar, Shantanu Jain

      public void reOpen(Account newAccount)
      This function sets the passed in account object's balance as the new balance and sets the boolean closed variable to false.
      Parameters:
      newAccount - - account object

      public void close()
      This function sets the balance to 0 and sets the boolean closed variable to true.

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(double amount)
      This function deducts the balance from an account, the amount that should be deducted from the balance is passed in as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      amount - - The amount that needs to be deducted or withdrawn from an account.

    • canBeWithdrawn

      public boolean canBeWithdrawn(double amount)
      This function checks if the requested amount can be withdrawn or not.
      Parameters:
      amount - - The amount requested by the user that needs to be withdrawn.
      Returns:
      true if amount is available in the user's account, else returns false.

    • deposit

      public void deposit(double amount)
      This function adds an amount to the current balance of the account
      Parameters:
      amount - - The amount that needs to be added in the current balance.

    • setBalance

      public void setBalance(double balance)
      This function sets the balance of an account.
      Parameters:
      balance - - balance left in the account.

    • setHolder

      public void setHolder(String fName, String lName, Date dob)
      This function sets the profile information of an account holder.
      Parameters:
      fName - - first name of account holder.
      lName - - last name of account holder.
      dob - - Date of birth of account holder.

    • monthlyInterest

      public abstract double monthlyInterest()
      This function returns a monthly interest depending on the type of the account.
      Returns:
      - a double which is the monthly interest that an account holder gets on his account.

    • fee

      public abstract double fee()
      This function returns a monthly fee that an account holder needs to pay on a monthly basis.
      Returns:
      - a double that has a monthly fee that an account holder needs to pay on a monthly basis depending on the account type.
